body.p:
Midway Ky
May 15th 1861
To his Excelency B Magoffin
Govener State Ky

The Petitianers of the Subscribers Citizens of Midway in the County of Woodford respectfully Showeth that they wish you to remit a fine of Ten Dollars ($10) which was Imposed on James Joyce in the Town of Midway for a Breach of the Peace in the 8th day of April 1861 he being a man of Small means and unable to pay the fine having a Family to Support by his daily Labor

Respectfully
J W Martin
G. Hall
Peter Senet
J Woolums
P. Lighter
N B Wells
